karita_divebomb.name: Karita Divebomb
karita_divebomb.desc: Launch into the air and deliver a devastating divebomb kick. Chains from Karita Leap.

ceaseless_slashes.name: Ceaseless Slashes
ceaseless_slashes.desc: Click to reveal yourself and deliver a rapid flurry of slashes that can chain together.

rapid_slashes.name: Rapid Slashes
rapid_slashes.desc: Rush down your opponent cutting them apart.
